name: roam-research-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server (with CLI support) for Roam Research API integration
author: Ian Shen / 2B3 PRODUCTIONS LLC

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
